name: Cosmic Pong
description:
My first game! Just a simple Pong game I made to get to grips with Clickteam Fusion. It features two distinct single player modes and a competitive multiplayer mode. The modes are:

Versus CPU (score more points than the CPU within 60 seconds)
Versus human (score more points than your friend in 60 seconds)
High score (scoring points adds to the timer and getting scored on costs you a life; try to get the highest score!)

The AI adapts to your ability, growing slower and stupider if you're struggling and reacting faster if you're doing well.

ESC pauses the game.

Let me know what you think!
